fr.sii.ogham.core.charset

Class FixedCharsetProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.charset.FixedCharsetProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CharsetProvider

    public class FixedCharsetProvider
extends Object
implements CharsetProvider
    Provider that always gives the same charset. The charset is provided at construction. If no charset is specified then UTF-8 is used.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FixedCharsetProvider()
      Initialize the provider with the default charset (UTF-8)
      FixedCharsetProvider(Charset charset)
      Initialize the provider with the given charset.
